channel.title: Hi Guys
channel.description: Hello Guys, i`m new... i downloaded a moparscape client for make a server and i created but i don`t know how to make me owner, how to add items, commands , make my own client and how to change name Please someone can help me :(

item.title: Hi Guys
item.dc:creator: @bl00dpk bl00dpk
item.description:
@bl00dpk wrote:

making yourself owner-
go to your source,data,characters
find your username,open the file
and look for playerrights or something similar, once you find it change the 0 to 3

spawning items-
you can try doing ::item (itemid) (amount)
if the dosent work then try ::pickup (itemid) (amount)

Read full topic

item.title: Hi Guys
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

First question… Did you create your server with the moparscape client?

if so… no… bad …

Download a source from the download section… turn it on and connect through differnt client most delta servers block moparscape.

Read full topic

item.title: Hi Guys
item.dc:creator: @austinsobes austinsobes
item.description:
@austinsobes wrote:

Just take a class on how to program first. I did what you are doing, trying to make a server before I learned how to do everything. Grab a Book(Free Java Ebooks are everywhere) and take some time to read up. When you have a background, come back, grab a base. And then start hacking away.

http://www.informit.com/library/library.aspx?b=STY_Java2_24hours

This is a good book if you have zero experience, as for any more experience in java. I cannot help beyond this.

Read full topic
